name: Triplets easter rabbit 3-pack
description: Cas plays modern with rustic wood, framing the rich color and defined grain of natural oak veneer in dark grey high-gloss lacquer.
description_long: Cas plays modern with rustic wood, framing the rich color and defined grain of natural oak veneer in dark grey high-gloss lacquer. Tinted warm brown with hints of grey, planks of veneer arrange the nightstand's four drawers in seamless asymmetry.

name: Nova pedal bin
description: The Nova bin by the Danish brand Zone Denmark is the perfect little bin for the bathroom. The bin opens with a foot pedal and is easy to
description_long: The Nova bin by the Danish brand Zone Denmark is the perfect little bin for the bathroom. The bin opens with a foot pedal and is easy to empty when needed. Available in several wonderful colours and beautiful in combination with other pieces from the Nova collection.
